meanings.definition: A woman who sells goods or services in a store.
meanings.sent1: The saleslady helped me find the perfect dress.
meanings.sent2: The saleslady at the boutique was very friendly.
meanings.sent3: The saleslady joked that she could sell ice to an Eskimo.
meanings.sent4: Her smile lit up the store like a saleslady with a magic wand.
meanings.sent5: I'll always remember the helpful saleslady who made my day brighter.

meanings.definition: A female employee who assists customers in making purchases.
meanings.sent1: The saleslady patiently explained the features of the product.
meanings.sent2: As a saleslady, she excelled in customer service.
meanings.sent3: The saleslady playfully suggested buying the whole store.
meanings.sent4: Her efficiency at the cash register was like a saleslady on a mission.
meanings.sent5: I admire the dedication of the saleslady who goes above and beyond for customers.
